title: Flowers Watch Faces
summary: Beautiful collection of Flowers watch faces that automatically change every hour
description: A unique and intelligent Smart Watch application that features a beautiful collection of Flowers watch faces with best in class user interface for customization. The carefully crafted design of the app syncs up your mobile and your smart watch seamlessly and provides rich user experience making it simple and easy to use.The unique features of the app are:- Watch Face changes automatically every hour.- Completely customizable to choose any Watch Face as permanent for every day- Analog and Digital dials available- Dynamically change the dial color based on the Image background. “Truly Fantastic “!!So, what are you waiting for? Download this unique app and enjoy a special and amazing experience
descriptionHTML:
A unique and intelligent Smart Watch application that features a beautiful collection of Flowers watch faces with best in class user interface for customization.

The carefully crafted design of the app syncs up your mobile and your smart watch seamlessly and provides rich user experience making it simple and easy to use.

The unique features of the app are:
- Watch Face changes automatically every hour.
- Completely customizable to choose any Watch Face as permanent for every day
- Analog and Digital dials available
- Dynamically change the dial color based on the Image background. “Truly Fantastic “!!

So, what are you waiting for? Download this unique app and enjoy a special and amazing experience
comments: I'm unable to get the faces to load on my Gear S2.
Would not work with Michael kors watch
This app has the most beautiful displays! I just love it!
Could  not get it to work!
Okay Crashes and does update when changing thr settings
